text: "For a Friend" is a single from the British pop duo The Communards taken from their 1987 album Red. The song is an emotional ballad and was written in the memory of Mark Ashton, a friend of Jimmy Somerville and Richard Coles. Mark Hooper of The Rough Guide to Rock writes that this cut may be Somerville's "most impassioned moment". "For a Friend" reached number 28 on the British charts. ==In media== The official music video for the song was directed by Andy Morahan. In 2014, the song was featured on the soundtrack to the film Pride..
